sdf:title: Optical RFID Tag
sdf:copyright: copyright 2016-2017, 2019 Open Connectivity Foundation, Inc. All rights reserved.
description: The Property "tagid" is an integer showing the currently read optical augmented RFID tag's identity information.

tagid.description: The tag read by the RFID reader.

reading.description: The reading indication. true: the tagid is read e.g. being valid. false: the tagid is invalid.
